column5: I don't want to start a debate here so Ill keep it simple..  Can anyone with knowledge of the Atlantic stocking programs or any general knowledge about Ontario atlantics please PM me or email me at kemper_35  (at) hotmail.com  I have some questions and information that I think might REALLY interest someone involved in the Atlantic program
Have you tried John Kendell??  He just luuuvs his little salars!
Try Chris Robinson at OFAH.  I dont have his email but you could call OFAH and ask for him.
Ah c'mon kemper, throw it out there, it cant get that ugly......
Tell me in a PM and I'll send it to Chris Westcott here at Fleming, he is #1 here for the raising of our Atlantics. I even helped release the 29'000

$20.  No doubt itll turn into a Marshmellow/snagging/lining/flossing/THATSMYSPOT/WHYAREYOUPOSTINGCOORDINATES/NOIWONTHELPYOUFISH thread.  Oh yeah, and add in a little of YOU'RE HOLDING THE FISH WRONG WHAT IS THE MATTER WITH YOU.
Thanks Chris.  Info sent to both emails.  Again trying to AVOID the atlantic debate...this thread can go to rest now the proper people have been contacted
Kemper, you are such a tease man!
are you saying you'll give me 20$ if it turns into a shemozzle? hahaha cuz i'm in
I'll bet that there won't be a shemozzle here. Kemper got the information he needed and as the OP, has asked that the thread be put to rest.
